sentence.Network_en: Imagine long golden beaches where you can wander in solitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 想象一下那长长的金色海滩吧，在那里你可以独自徜徉。

sentence.Network_en: Solitude was no excuse for sloppiness.
She longed for peace and solitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 她渴望安宁，渴望独享清静。

The happiest of all lives as a busy solitude . -- Bertrand Russell ., 最幸福的人过的是忙碌孤独的日子 . -- 罗素.
翻译词典... ... solitude n.单独(荒僻之处) in solitude 孤独地 Live in solitude 离群索居.
Blanche solitude 白色的孤独Tu ne viendras pas ce soir 今夜你不会来Me crie mon désespoir 我宣布我的绝望Mais tombe la neige 可是落雪了Impassible manege.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin solitudo, from solus 'alone'

entry.def: Solitude is the state of being alone, especially when this is peaceful and pleasant.

example.ex: He enjoyed his moments of solitude before the pressures of the day began...
example.tran: 他喜欢在白天的压力到来之前享受独处的时光。

example.ex: Imagine long golden beaches where you can wander in solitude.
example.tran: 想象一下那长长的金色海滩吧，在那里你可以独自徜徉。

auth_sentence.content: Solitude, paranoia and self-loathing were the themes here.

auth_sentence.content: The solitude was extreme because it wasn't physical.

auth_sentence.content: Try these stress-buster strolls in silence and solitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: Try these stress-buster strolls in silence and solitude.

sentences.en: People need a chance to re-flect on spiritual matters in solitude.
sentences.cn: 人们需要独处的机会来反思精神上的事情。
